text: Alisha Parveen is an Indian actress. She made her debut in 2015 with as Shruti Tandon in film Talvar. she portrayed Manyata "Mannu" Rawat in Muskuraane Ki Vajah Tum Ho. Later she played the lead role of Aliya Randhawa in Udaariyaan. Since October 2024, she stars as Aadhya / Raahi Kapadia in Anupamaa. She made her web debut with School Friends (3 seasons) as Dimple Chaddha. == Filmography == === Films === Year Title Role 2015 Talvar Shruti Tandon 2017 Maatr Tia Chauhan === Television === Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2020 - 2021 Qurbaan Hua Naveli Bhatt Dhyani 2022 Muskuraane Ki Vajah Tum Ho Manyata "Mannu" Rawat 2022 Gathbandhan Preeti Parekh 2023 - 2024 Udaariyaan Aliya Randhawa Lead 2024 - 2025 Anupamaa Aadhya / Raahi Kapadia Lead === Web series === Year Title Role Note Ref. 2023â€“present School Friends Dimple Chaddha 3 Seasons 2025 Emergency Room Trisha Sharma == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Indian actors Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian soap opera actors Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:Actors in Hindi cinema Category:21st-century Indian actors Category:2001 births
title: Alisha Parveen
